document_data.mainbody:
Malley was a small town located on the island of Gwynneth within the Moonshae Isles.
OMalley was located in the kingdom of Corwell in southern Gwynneth. The town was located along the halfway point on Corwell Road between Caer Corwell in the west and Kingsbay in the east. OMalley sat among the foothills where the Highlands and Cambro Mountains met in the shadow of the hidden kingdom of Synnoria. 
Natives of OMalley had been known to celebrate victories over firbolg raiders by placing their heads upon spikes and dancing around them.
